entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
